## Resources.IResourceDeclarationOptions.reduceQualifiers property

If true, reduces the qualifiers of the resource candidates by removing qualifiers that are made irrelevant by the filterForContext.

**Signature:**

```typescript
reduceQualifiers?: boolean;
```
